components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE,VISIBILITY,EQUIPMENT
summary: INTERMITTENTLY WHILE DRIVING, THE ENGINE COMPLETELY DIED.  THE DEALER HAS BEEN UNABLE TO DUPLICATE THE ISSUE.  THE VEHICLE IS A 2001 MERCEDES E320.   *AK   THE ENGINE WOULD SHUT OFF INTERMITTENTLY.  AFTER ABOUT 5 MINUTES THE VEHICLE WOULD RESTART.  THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE IN SEVERAL TIMES FOR REPAIR BUT THE PROBLEM COULD NOT BE FOUND.  THE WASHER TUBE CAME OFF AND CAUSED WASHER FLUID TO LEAK.  THE FUEL GAUGE FAILED WHICH CAUSED IT TO READ INCORRECTLY.  THE HEAD REST MOTOR FAILED.    *SCC  *NLM
